data.name: Work and Play, Together: Best Practices for Remote Working
data.summary: TiE Delhi-NCR introduces the "Work and Play, Together: Best Practices for Remote Working " webinar, where you will get to learn pro tips on how remote working works and how to make it work, during this crisis and beyond.
data.speakers:
Vinay Bhartia, Country Director, Lark India
Vinod Sood, Founder, Hughes Sistique
Raman Roy, Chairman Quattro
Sana Nayyar, HR Head, Urban Company
